SEARCH
Package wss.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
wss.player.Player
public class Player extends Object
Represents a player in the Wilderness Survival System game. Each player has a position, strength, brain (decision making), vision (map scanning), and an inventory of resources (food, water, gold).

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String name, Vision vision, Brain brain, GameMap map, int startStrength, int maxfood, int maxwater, int maxgold)
      Constructs a player with given starting conditions.
      Parameters:
      name - The player's name
      vision - The player's vision strategy
      brain - The player's AI decision strategy
      map - The game map reference
      startStrength - Initial strength value
      startFood - Initial food value
      startWater - Initial water value

  • Method Details

    • takeTurn

      public void takeTurn()
      Executes one simulation turn for the player. If the player is still active, their brain chooses a direction and moves them. Ends the game if strength is depleted or the player reaches the goal.

    • move

      public void move(MoveDirection dir)
      Moves the player in the specified direction and applies terrain/item effects.
      Parameters:
      dir - The direction to move

    • hasAnyLegalMove

      public boolean hasAnyLegalMove()
      Checks if the player can move in any direction, considering terrain and current resources.
      Returns:
      true if there is at least one legal move

    • increaseFood

      public void increaseFood(int amount)
      Increases player's food in inventory.
      Parameters:
      amount - Food to add

    • increaseWater

      public void increaseWater(int amount)
      Increases player's water in inventory.
      Parameters:
      amount - Water to add

    • increaseGold

      public void increaseGold(int amount)
      Increases player's gold in inventory.
      Parameters:
      amount - Gold to add

    • hasFinished

      public boolean hasFinished()
      Checks whether the player has finished playing.
      Returns:
      True if player is done (either reached goal or died)

    • reachedGoal

      public boolean reachedGoal()
      Checks if the player reached the eastern edge of the map.
      Returns:
      True if the player reached the goal

      public int getX()

    • generateReport

      public GameReport generateReport()
      Generates a GameReport containing this player's final game statistics.
      Returns:
      GameReport object summarizing the player's performance.
